short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract and view entity attributes from Dynamics CRM forms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dynamics CRM Entity Attributes Extractor allows users to extract and view entity attributes and controls directly from Dynamics CRM forms. This extension provides an efficient way to fetch, filter, and analyze CRM entity attributes, helping developers and administrators better understand the structure of their CRM entity attributes.
